data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Una, Himachal Pradesh, India to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Una, Himachal Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the county of Una.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Una, Himachal Pradesh, India to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Una, Himachal Pradesh, India a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the county.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Jat Dhillon (Hindu traditions) people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Una, Himachal Pradesh, India to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Una, Himachal Pradesh, India know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the county of Una to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.

location.name: Una
